column4: what ftp server would you reccomend (for occasional xfers with friends)

it's not so much that i want the best :), but since it's not really a fulltime server i'm considering something in userspace.  i'll have a look at vsftpd in any case.  just hoped that some people had been through the sorting process and could saave me some time :)
I understand completely where you are coming from :)
